name: Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs
description: Identify how your character's needs are met using psychologist Abraham Maslow's personality framework

attributes.name: Physiological Needs
attributes.description: Level 1: How are the character's biological needs for survival  being met? (e.g. food, shelter, clothing, sex)

attributes.name: Safety Needs
attributes.description: Level 2: How is the character's need for safety and security being met? (e.g. financially, emotionally, socially)

attributes.name: Love and Belongingness Needs
attributes.description: Level 3: How is the character's need for belonging being met? (e.g. friendship, trust, acceptance, love)

attributes.name: Esteem Needs
attributes.description: Level 4: How is the character's need for self-esteem and respect from others being met? (e.g. status, prestige)

attributes.name: Self-Actualization Needs
attributes.description: Level 5: How is the character's need for self-fulfillment being met? (e.g. achieving their full potential)
